Title: Use and study Chairman Mao's glorious philosophical thought in a big way
Designer: Political Work Group of the Revolutionary Committee of the Qishuyan Railroad Factory (戚墅堰铁路工厂革命委员会政工组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Mao's writings provide the answer to every question in every situation - also regarding daily work in the factory.
